text: There was a fox who had never seen a lion. Fate put her one day before the real beast. And since it was the first time he saw her, he felt a terrible fear and walked away as fast as he could. When he met the lion for the second time, he was still afraid, but less so than before, and he watched him calmly for a while. Finally, on seeing him for the third time, he got brave enough to approach him to engage in conversation. As you learn something, you lose your fear of it. But always keep the right distance and prudence.
title: La zorra que nunca había visto un león
author: nan Esopo
